name: SmokeFighter
description:
Game idea made by students for the Trijam 114 GameJam.

In this game you need to extinguish all the fire from the building! Once you have extinguished it all, IT COMES AGAIN!

Controls

  • Arrow or WASD to move around
  • Space to throw water

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Photoshop

Credits

  • Music & SFX
  • Explosion SFX
